definition: great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River
the Grand Canyon of the Nujiang river in Tibet and Yunnan

pinyin: Ke1 luo2 la1 duo1 da4 xia2 gu3

definition: Great Canyon of Yarlung Tsangpo-Brahmaputra (through the southeast Himalayas, from Tibet to Assam and Bangladesh)
pinyin: Ya3 lu3 zang4 bu4 Da4 xia2 gu3

sentences.english: Barbarian can hop across gaps on the map.
sentences.chinese: 他可以跳過地圖上的烈風峽谷之類障礙。

sentences.english: Ride the rails along deep river canyons and over high mountain passes.
sentences.chinese: 沿着深河峽谷和高山通行的路軌。

sentences.english: This fame have a metempsychosis again.
sentences.chinese: 傳說在花江峽谷開始了又一次輪迴。

sentences.english: The men rippled farther outward, lighting lanterns and moving into the gorge.
sentences.chinese: 人們向更遠的地方找去，點起了燈籠，走進了峽谷。

sentences.english: The river meanders through the gorges.
sentences.chinese: 這河曲曲彎彎地流過峽谷。

sentences.english: Has Gwen been to the glen?
Today, Han Jia and I will bring you to Linzhou to take a look at the Grand Taihang Canyon.
sentences.chinese: 今天我和韓佳就要帶你去林州的太行大峽谷看一看。

sentences.english: He first collected women's landays in his native Kunar River Valley.
sentences.chinese: 他首次收錄婦女們的頌歌是在他的故鄉庫納爾河峽谷。

sentences.english: The canyon walls are lined with giant harpy nests and guano.
sentences.chinese: 峽谷壁上到處是巨大的鳥身人巢穴和鳥糞。

sentences.english: Aaron jumped a 15ft wide ravine on his motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 他騎着摩托車跳躍一個15英尺寬的峽谷。

sentences.english: The Austrians had similar posts on the mountains across the valley.
sentences.chinese: 在峽谷對面的山上，奧軍也有類似的戰地指揮所。

sentences.english: Leaping over Caudine Forks is a theoretical viewpoint put forth by Marx in his remaining you.
sentences.chinese: 跨越卡夫丁峽谷是馬克思晚年提出的一個理論觀點。

sentences.english: To the west of the mountains is San Joaquin Valley, the southern half of the Central Valley.
sentences.chinese: 西面的山嶺是聖華金河谷，中央大峽谷的南半部分。

sentences.english: The horse trotted along the canyon under the burning sun.
sentences.chinese: 馬在烈日下沿著峽谷小跑步。

sentences.english: We arrive at the Grand Canyon the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨，我們終於到了大峽谷。

sentences.english: The canyons were alive with gray parrots having a ball. They seemed to love listening to their echoes.
sentences.chinese: 灰鸚鵡歡叫着，自戀地聽着回聲，峽谷一派生意盎然。

definition: great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River
topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
plank walkway constructed on the face of a cliff/(archaic) elevated passageway connecting the upper levels of adjacent towers
